page.title: 14Day in my Life(2):Hadleigh
page.content: Our House comes to life at 7.30a.m. Mum gets up and gets ready for work. Then my brother gets up and gets ready for school. I get up about 8.00a.m. Mum then leaves for work. Dad's away at work. I get ready for school and we leave the house at 8.45a.m. I call for Emma, Spencer calls for Ian and then we go to school. We have dinner at school at 12.00. I get home from school about 3.30p.m.,Spencer gets home about 4.00, Mum gets home between 5.00 or 6.00p.m. Dad comes home at weekends. We watch T.V. or go out to play, or we go with Mum when she plays netball.
